posts.post_content:
Looking for Charlie Ferguson:
Old Judge tagging player pose
Old Judge hands ready at chest
Buchner Gold Coin
Gypsy Queen
Kalamazoo bats
Tobin Lithograph black/white

have PayPal ready, also have lots of t206's to trade and an OJ Burnham to trade only for the cards mentioned.  Please contact me if you have any of these, [url]shannon_yowell@hotmail.com[/url]

Longtime member of TR and happy to deal.
Thanks, Shannon
